title: Fix 404 canister ID not found error on production

requirements.text: Ensure the correct canister ID is embedded in frontend/index.html meta tag so the ICP0.io gateway can resolve the frontend canister. Verify the canister ID in the meta tag matches the deployed frontend canister ID exactly, and that it is present at page load before any JS executes.

quotes: i tried it again and is showing error 404 canister id not found

acceptanceCriteria: The <meta name='dfinity-canister-id'> tag in frontend/index.html contains the correct deployed frontend canister ID
Loading the production URL no longer returns a 404 canister not found error
The app loads successfully on the ICP0.io gateway

requirements.text: Ensure the backend canister ID referenced in the frontend actor configuration (useActor.ts and any generated declarations) matches the deployed backend canister ID. Regenerate or update canister ID bindings if there is a mismatch.
acceptanceCriteria: The backend canister ID used in actor initialization matches the deployed backend canister
No 404 errors are thrown when the frontend attempts to communicate with the backend canister

requirements.text: Audit the dfx.json and canister configuration to confirm that frontend and backend canister IDs are consistently defined and that the deployment targets the correct network (ic mainnet). Fix any misconfigured canister IDs or network targets.
acceptanceCriteria: dfx.json references the correct canister IDs for both frontend and backend on the ic network
